ygData.subject: Re: feedback?
ygData.msgSnippet: well, my dark elf cleric on Rallos Zek has two words in her feedback: I bite. On the other hand, my primary character, a wood elf ranger, has a little blurb
ygData.messageBody:
well, my dark elf cleric on Rallos Zek has two words in her feedback: "I bite."

On the other hand, my primary character, a wood elf ranger, has a little blurb
about (lemme think here)..."You see before you a Champion of Faydark, wide-eyed
about the world and loyal to her guild." Kinda schmaltzy, but I was recovering
from a train in Paw when I wrote it. Hehe. Maybe it's time for a change.

Sara, Povar

ali@... wrote:

> From: ali@...
>
> Hey EQ women!
>
> Really enjoying the discussion here. Glad to find out that I'm not the only
> person who's married and plays EQ (I'm 25).
>
> anyway, question for y'all... I'm trying to come up with something to write
> in my feedback slot, but I'd like to see some examples for inspiration. Do
> any of you have character descriptions (or anything else) in your feedback
> slot?
>
> -Ardynn
> Druid, Povar
